description: book attached to army green-gray tarpaulin that ties with leather cord; images painted inside tarp as it unfolds to access spiral-bound book; retrospective of Multerer's work featuring color photos and text essays; gray cover with simple text, black and white block image of artist on back; bound volume; lender's archive #197
markings: Numbered in blue ink on last page: -1-
medium: Photographic reproductions on paper; cover of weathered truck tarpaulin, collage, leather tie, metal grommet, and white crayon
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed:
Signed and dated in white crayon inside the cover: Gerhard Multerer │ 2007
Signed in blue ink on last page: Gerhard Multerer
title: Buch um Buch: List of Works, 1991-2006
